name: Fade (StardustLegend)
description:
My first ever game, a small bullet hell game with 5 levels. (still in development) i hope you enjoy! o3o

If there are any problems or suggestions, please post below! ^3^

Update 10/24/2016- Fixed the problem with lag on the Problems levels and changed around a few things to make the other levels slightly harder o3o

Update 10/26/2016- Development on the final level is still under way, but in the meantime I've made some buffs to the levels:

-Anger's fireballs now target the player

-Problems now fires more rapidly

-Life's Laserbeam now changes direction of rotation every few seconds

Update 10/27/2016- Okay Anger's fireballs no longer target the player because that was way to unreasonable, but I still made it slightly harder by having them scatter

Update 11/1/2016- Major Update! Fade's final level has been complete and can be unlocked by beating the first four! I hope you enjoy it, I put a lot of hard work into this project. I also did some minor buffs on certain enemies. The game may still have some bugs so I'm going to leave as "in development" for a little until I iron out all the rough edges. I hope you enjoy though! o3o
